'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire world map|location]] in {{bow}}.

==Background==
This picturesque village was built on the edge of the Dead Floe, a massive glacier that seems to be growing with each passing year. It is inhabited by a peculiar cult of [[Rymrgand]], zealously devoted to death and dying, led by an endings godlike called [[Vatnir]].

==Points of interest==
* The village is small, centered around [[Harbingers' Retreat]], the common house. To the southwest is a statue of Rymrgand create by [[Harbinger Leksi]], with [[Harbingers' dwelling]] below. The fishmonger and brewer offer their wares along the stream to the northeast. The exit deeper into the glacier is located on the northwestern ice wall, and requires [[Vatnir's icepicks]] to pass through.

==Characters==
* [[Harbinger Hafjórn]], the local butcher and greeter
* [[Harbinger Leksi]], ice sculptor
* [[Harbinger Karlódh]], fishmonger
* [[Harbinger Nyvardir]], brewer
